```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(rstatix)
library("dplyr")
library("tidyverse")
library("lubridate")
library("readxl")
library("writexl")
library(datarium)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
#install.packages("emmeans")
library(emmeans)

getwd()
Sapwood<-read_xlsx("../Data/Processed/Sapwood/PlotLevelSapwood.xlsx")

```

```{r}
Sapwood<-Sapwood%>%filter(DOY>151 & DOY<274)
m0<-lm(SapwoodPerGroundArea~Density*Geno*DOY+(1|Block), data = Sapwood)

m0
summary(m0)
aov(m0)

m0a<-aov(SapwoodPerGroundArea~Density*Geno*DOY+(1|Block), data = Sapwood)
summary(m0a)
emmeans(m0a, ~Density:Geno,data=Sapwood)

```
